Name: Divan Chronicles
About the game: Divan Chronicles should we sit on the couch while others decide the fate of Meme Power? Who will give us the wisdom to make the right choice? Funny RPG with stupid (fun) main content, you can to change history of Sofa Island You will play for Meme Son and will defeat elder evil , you will be able to choose 'what do you want in country (Sofa Island)' - capitalism or socialism What is already in the game: 2 episodes; the beginning of miserable adventures; Sofa Conventions! 1.5 boss*; Poor Combat Mechanics; Battle in a puddle, not 'naval battles', Pataraia extensive water puddles on a raft!; and much more; What will be in the game: more FREE episodes, and free additional content in existing episodes
